dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, big news this week out of China, it seems like the regulatory hammer is really coming down hard on both Ant Group and Alibaba.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, big news this week out of China, it seems like the regulatory hammer is really coming down hard on both Ant Group and Alibaba.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chinas regulators abruptly halted Ants record $35 billion IPO and subsequently announced investigations into its sprawling business in November. ... The Hangzhou-based company has been the subject of an anti-monopoly probe that started in December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Host_A, it's, uh, pretty wild. For Ant Group, they're basically being forced to put *all* their businesses into a holding company.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Host A, it's, uh, pretty wild. For Ant Group, they're basically being forced to put all their businesses into a holding company.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Quoting anonymous sources familiar with the matter, the report said the plan requires Ant to place all of its businesses into the holding company, including its technology offerings in areas like blockchain and food-delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, like, even their tech offerings? Blockchain, food delivery, all of it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, like, even their tech offerings? Blockchain, food delivery, all of it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Quoting anonymous sources familiar with the matter, the report said the plan requires Ant to place all of its businesses into the holding company, including its technology offerings in areas like blockchain and food-delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, that's the word. Anonymous sources are saying it could be announced before Lunar New Year, which is, like, February 11th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, that's the word. Anonymous sources are saying it could be announced before Lunar New Year, which is, like, February eleventh.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: An official announcement may come before the start of Chinas Lunar New Year holiday on February 11.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. And this is all happening after their massive IPO got abruptly halted back in November, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. And this is all happening after their massive I P O got abruptly halted back in November, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chinas regulators abruptly halted Ants record $35 billion IPO and subsequently announced investigations into its sprawling business in November.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Alibaba's CEO, Daniel Zhang, had already warned about "substantial uncertainties" for Ant's future. He wasn't kidding, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Alibaba's C E O, Daniel Zhang, had already warned about substantial uncertainties for Ant's future. He wasn't kidding, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a call with analysts just a day earlier, Alibabas BABA -3.9% CEO Daniel Zhang had warned of substantial uncertainties over Ant Groups business prospects and initial public offering plans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] No kidding. And then there's Alibaba itself, which is also facing its own anti-monopoly probe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No kidding. And then there's Alibaba itself, which is also facing its own anti-monopoly probe.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Meanwhile, Alibaba has also recently been placed under heavy regulatory scrutiny. The Hangzhou-based company has been the subject of an anti-monopoly probe that started in December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, the "er xuan yi" thing. You know, "choose one of two." Forcing merchants to sell exclusively on their platform.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, the er xuan yi thing. You know, choose one of two. Forcing merchants to sell exclusively on their platform.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Its said to be under investigation for alleged monopolistic business practices like er xuan yi, which means choose one of two. Its a policy that forces merchants to sell exclusively on just one platform.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which, uh, sounds pretty clearly monopolistic to me. They've even set up a task force to cooperate with regulators.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, uh, sounds pretty clearly monopolistic to me. They've even set up a task force to cooperate with regulators.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Tuesday, Alibaba said that it had established a special task force to conduct internal reviews, and will cooperate with the State Administration for Market Regulation (SAMR) in its ongoing investigation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but, you know, they just had this huge quarter, sales up 37%, but then their shares dropped almost 4% in Hong Kong.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but, you know, they just had this huge quarter, sales up thirty seven percent, but then their shares dropped almost four percent in Hong Kong.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sales for the three months ended in December jumped another 37% to 221.08 billion yuan ($34.24 billion). ... Alibabas shares fell almost 4% in Hong Kong on Wednesday amid concerns about the companys ongoing regulatory challenges.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the regulatory cloud is just, like, hanging over everything. And let's not forget Jack Ma.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the regulatory cloud is just, like, hanging over everything. And let's not forget Jack Ma.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, man. Jack Ma, Alibaba's co-founder, conspicuously left out of a state media list of entrepreneurial leaders. After disappearing for months!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, man. Jack Ma, Alibaba's co-founder, conspicuously left out of a state media list of entrepreneurial leaders. After disappearing for months!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibabas billionaire cofounder Jack Ma, a former English teacher who has long been the face of entrepreneurship and innovation in China, was conspicuously left out of a list of Chinas entrepreneurial leaders compiled by state media this week. ... Ma had only just made his first public appearance in January after disappearing from public view for nearly three months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's a huge public signal, isn't it? From the face of Chinese innovation to, uh, practically persona non grata.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a huge public signal, isn't it? From the face of Chinese innovation to, uh, practically persona non grata.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. It shows how serious the government is. For Ant, these new capital requirements are going to *completely* change their business model.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. It shows how serious the government is. For Ant, these new capital requirements are going to completely change their business model.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Brock Silvers, a Hong Kong-based chief investment officer of Kaiyuan Capital, says the regulatory risk is more real for Ant. New capital requirements will completely change Ants business model, and any new IPO would be saddled with significantly lower pricing, he said in an email.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, any future IPO would be, like, significantly lower priced, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, any future I P O would be, like, significantly lower priced, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: New capital requirements will completely change Ants business model, and any new IPO would be saddled with significantly lower pricing, he said in an email.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And for Alibaba, this anti-monopoly probe comes when they're already dealing with intense competition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And for Alibaba, this anti-monopoly probe comes when they're already dealing with intense competition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But Shawn Yang, a Shenzhen-based managing director of research firm Blue Lotus Capital Advisors, points out that Alibabas anti-monopoly probe comes at a time when the company is already grappling with increasing competition.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Like JD.com and Pinduoduo. And even ByteDance, with Douyin pushing into e-commerce now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Like J D dot com and Pinduoduo. And even ByteDance, with Douyin pushing into e-commerce now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Besides direct challenges from e-commerce platforms JD.com and Pinduoduo, Alibaba also has to increasingly compete with short video sites for the attention of shoppers. For example, Bytedance, the parent company of short video app TikTok, is experimenting with adding more e-commerce and payment features to TikToks Chinese version, Douyin, which has more than 600 million daily active users in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right! So, this investigation might just, um, speed up that trend, forcing Alibaba to charge merchants less to keep them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! So, this investigation might just, um, speed up that trend, forcing Alibaba to charge merchants less to keep them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The anti-monopoly investigation may expedite this trend, and the company may have to charge merchants less to ensure they will stay.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like a really challenging road ahead for both of these tech giants.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like a really challenging road ahead for both of these tech giants.
